net.asrex.skillful.ui

Class TexturePosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.ui.TexturePosition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpriteSheetPosition

    public class TexturePosition
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies position information for a particular part of a texture image.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        A unique identifier for this texture. Required for textures defined in textures.yml, but can be ignored if defined directly in ui.yml.

      • texture

        public java.lang.String texture
        An optional texture to set before attempting to draw. If null, the previously bound texture is used.
